      • isAttributeEscapingMode

        public boolean isAttributeEscapingMode()
        Get the attribute escaping mode flag. When set to true, CDATA sections and Comments are not skipped.
        Returns:
        the attribute escaping mode flag. Defaults to false.

      • isConvertEntityType

        public boolean isConvertEntityType()
        Test if convert is set. Converts to numberic or symbol entities depending on isNumericEntities().
        Returns:
        true to convert based on isNumericEntities(), false for default behavior.

      • isEscapeEntities

        public boolean isEscapeEntities()

      • isReplaceCharacterWithEntity

        public boolean isReplaceCharacterWithEntity()
        If true, causes characters to be replaced with the corresponding entity symbol during escaping. True is the default.
        Returns:
        true to do entity replacement.

      • setAttributeEscapingMode

      • setConvertEntityType

        public EntityUtil.EscapeOptions setConvertEntityType(boolean convertEntityType)
        Set convert flag. True, to convert to numberic or symbol entities depending on isNumericEntities(). This is not compatible with the setEscapeEntities(true) option.
        Parameters:
        convertEntityType - flag.
        Returns:
        this.

      • setEscapeEntities

        public EntityUtil.EscapeOptions setEscapeEntities(boolean escapeEntities)
        Set the escape entities flag. This basically escapes ampersands.

        NOTE: unlike all other escaping options, when this option is enabled the escape utility will escape characters that have already been escaped. Use EntityUtil.escapeForPersistence(String) to only escape ampersands at most one time.

        Parameters:
        escapeEntities - the escape entities flag.
        Returns:
        this.

      • setNumericEntities

        public EntityUtil.EscapeOptions setNumericEntities(boolean numericEntities)
        Set the numeric entities flag. Set to true if you don't want named entities in your document. Useful in situations where the named entities are not defined.
        Parameters:
        numericEntities - the numeric entities flag.
        Returns:
        this.

      • setOutputBreakTagForNewline

        public EntityUtil.EscapeOptions setOutputBreakTagForNewline(boolean outputBreakTagForNewline)
        Set the outputBreakTagForNewline flag. Set to true to have \n or \r replaced with a break tag. Defaults to false.
        Parameters:
        outputBreakTagForNewline - the outputBreakTagForNewline.
        Returns:
        this.

      • setOutputXHTML

        public EntityUtil.EscapeOptions setOutputXHTML(boolean outputXHTML)
        Set the outputXHTML flag.
        Parameters:
        outputXHTML - the outputXHTML flag.
        Returns:
        this.

      • setReplaceCharacterWithEntity

        public EntityUtil.EscapeOptions setReplaceCharacterWithEntity(boolean replaceCharacterWithEntity)
        Causes characters to be replaced with the corresponding entity symbol during escaping if true. True is the default.
        Parameters:
        replaceCharacterWithEntity - the flag.
        Returns:
        this.
